intro: I am a software engineer and IT instructor.
///About me: This section concerns translation in the About me section
detail: My name is NDANG ESSI Pierre Junior. I am a professional and enthusiastic fullstack web and mobile developer and software engineer in my daily life. I am a quick learner with a high quality self-learning attitude. I love to learn and explore new technologies and am passionate about problem-solving. I love almost all the stacks of application development. I am also highly competitive in projects, my main objective is to work in a large number of very usefull applications. My core skill is based on JavaScript, but my favorite language is Python. I am available for any kind of job opportunity that suits my skills and interests.
///Experience: This section concerns translation in the Experience section
e1: WHAT I HAVE DONE SO FAR
///Experience Points: This section contains all the experience section bullet points
exp.it_instructor.point1: Teaching to already and not yet IT students about software engineering concepts.
exp.js_developer.point1: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js/Next.js and other related technologies.
exp.js_developer.point2: Developing mobile cross-platform applications using React Native and other related technologies.
exp.js_developer.point3: Developing and maintaining desktop applications using Electron.js.
exp.js_developer.point4: Developing backend services and REST APIs using Node.js.
exp.js_developer.point5: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
exp.js_developer.point6: In some projects teams with friends including designers and other developers to create high-quality products, one of those was presented at the 2022 Github Hackaton.
exp.js_developer.point7: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
exp.js_developer.point8: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.
exp.python_developer.point1: Developing and maintaining desktop (Tkinter) and backend web applications (FastAPI).
exp.python_developer.point2: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
exp.python_developer.point3: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.
exp.software_engineer.point1: Managing software development life cycle in an Agile way using Trello and Github.
exp.software_engineer.point2: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product manager, and other developers to create high-quality products.
exp.software_engineer.point3: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.
exp.software_engineer.point4: Producing high quality documentation with Microsoft office and UML modeling softwares.

newsMessage: Do you want to create a high-quality software ?
a1: I am a full-stack web/mobile software developer, and an intermediate software engineer.
a2: I have expertise in Python, JavaScript, Java and Kotlin programming languages.
a3: My goal is to work on as many large-scale software projects as possible.
a4: I really love designing interfaces. I always work hard to produce a good user experience.
